verses.name: Psalms 104:12
verses.text: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.

verses.name: Psalms 104:13
verses.text: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.

verses.name: Psalms 104:14
verses.text: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;

verses.name: Psalms 104:15
verses.text: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man’s heart.

verses.name: Psalms 104:16
verses.text: The trees of the Lord are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;
